AindGeneric.description: Base class for generic types that can be used in AIND schema
AindGeneric.title: AindGeneric

name.const: Huazhong University of Science and Technology
name.default: Huazhong University of Science and Technology
name.title: Name

primary_scan.description: Indicates the primary scan used for downstream analysis
primary_scan.title: Primary scan

name.const: National Institute of Neurological Disorders and Stroke
name.default: National Institute of Neurological Disorders and Stroke
name.title: Name

Rotation3dTransform.description: Values to be vector-added to a 3D position. Often needed to specify a device or tile's origin.
Rotation3dTransform.title: Rotation3dTransform

Scale3dTransform.description:
Values to be vector-multiplied with a 3D position, equivalent to the diagonals of a 3x3 transform matrix.
Represents voxel spacing if used as the first applied coordinate transform.
Scale3dTransform.title: Scale3dTransform

Translation3dTransform.description: Values to be vector-added to a 3D position. Often needed to specify a device or tile's origin.
Translation3dTransform.title: Translation3dTransform

subject_id.description: Unique identifier for the subject. If this is not a Allen LAS ID, indicate this in the Notes.
subject_id.title: Subject ID

experimenter_full_name.description: First and last name of the experimenter(s).
experimenter_full_name.title: Experimenter(s) full name
